DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate treatment efficacy 8 week swallow exercise program patient NPC radiation therapy . This study also compare two different swallow exercise : effortful swallow Mendelsohn 's maneuver , see one bring benefit patient certain period exercise training . Three assessment tool select evaluate study result : Mann Assessment Swallowing Ability ( MASA ) , videofluoroscopic swallow study ( VFSS ) , Chinese version Swallowing Quality-of-Life Questionnaire ( CSWAL-QOL ) . The hypothesis study effortful swallowing exercise would better treatment efficacy .
